title: Nigeria's SEC Updates Guidelines for Crypto Firms in Bid to Stop Criminal Activity: Report
description: Nigeria's government has started a fresh crackdown on crypto firms, reportedly blocking access to several, including Binance, Coinbase and Kraken.

title: Pantera Capital Eyes $250M $SOL Buy from FTX
description:
The firm is raising funds to buy $250M of $SOL from bankrupt FTX at a potential 39% discount. This initiative shows Pantera Capital’s belief in Solana’s long-term value and skill in capitalizing on distressed assets. Pantera Bets Big on Solana’s Future According to Bloomberg, the investment proposition comes with an enticing incentive for investors. The […]

The post Pantera Capital Eyes $250M $SOL Buy from FTX appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: Holders Of SEI, Arbitrum and BlastUP Will in This Bull Run
description:
Bitcoin hit an all-time high recently, creating a buzz in the crypto market. Amid this event, owners of Sei, Arbitrum, and BlastUP seem to be in a beneficial spot.
